class.name: World3D
class.brief_description: Class that has everything pertaining to a world.
class.description: Class that has everything pertaining to a world. A physics space, a visual scenario, a navigation map and a sound space. Spatial nodes register their resources into the current world.

members.member: Direct access to the world's physics 3D space state. Used for querying current and potential collisions.
The World's fallback_environment will be used if the World's [Environment3D] fails or is missing.
The [RID] of this world's navigation map. Used by the [NavigationServer].
The [RID] of this world's vertex light 3d space resource. Used by the [VertexLights3DServer] for static 3D lights. If the vertex lights 3d module is not enabled this will just return an empty RID.
